name: Treasure Beach: an adventure in the turtle island
name_original: Treasure Beach: an adventure in the turtle island
description:
A single level platformer for the  Pizza Game Jam (august 2019).  it's based on the name of two racehorses  form the Irish Triple Crown Winners. Treasure Beach, winner of the 2011 Irish Derby and Turtle Island winner of the 1994 Irish 1000 Guineas (currently known as Irish 2000 guineas). The goal of the game is collect 160 coins in a beach ambiented level avoiding the spikes in the ground.

Controls
  • Press left and right to move around
  • Press X to jump and swim
  • Press down to fall of the platforms
    the controls are also in the help section of the game
